query:
UPDATE tickets
               SET name = ?,
                   description = ?,
                   qty_total = ?,
                   qty_per_person = ?,
                   kind = ?,
                   sort = ?,
                   price = ?,
                   price_min = ?,
                   price_max = ?,
                   price_default = ?,
                   notice_hours = ?,
                   updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
               WHERE id = ?
